00020 #include "GenericFileUpdaterTest.h"
00021 
00022 using namespace std;
00023 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00024 
00025 #define TEST_FILE_NAME "../data/small_cel_file"
00026 
00027 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( GenericFileUpdaterTest );
00028 
00029 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::setUp() {}
00030 
00031 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::tearDown() {}

00037 
00038 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::UpdaterTest()
00039 {
00040         string tempFile = TEST_FILE_NAME;
00041         tempFile.append(".TMP");
00042         if(Copy(TEST_FILE_NAME, tempFile))
00043         {
00044                 GenericFileUpdater* updater = new GenericFileUpdater(tempFile);
00045                 DataSetHeader dataSetHdr;
00046                 dataSetHdr.SetName(L"Test");
00047                 dataSetHdr.SetRowCnt(1);
00048                 dataSetHdr.AddAsciiColumn(L"Test", 32);
00049                 DataSetWriter* writer = updater->GetUpdateDataSetWriter(dataSetHdr);
00050                 writer->WriteHeader();
00051                 writer->Write("Hello World", 32);
00052 
00053                 writer->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00054                 delete writer;
00055                 delete updater;
00056 
00057                 GenericData gData;
00058                 GenericFileReader reader;
00059                 reader.SetFilename(tempFile);
00060                 reader.ReadHeader(gData);
00061                 gData.Close();
00062                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSetCnt() == 6);
00063                 std::wstring name = gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetName();
00064                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(name.compare(L"Test") == 0);
00065         }
00066         remove(tempFile.c_str());
00067 }
00068 
00069 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::Updater2Test()
00070 {
00071         // Update by adding a DataSetHeader that has zero rows and cols and has items in the parameter list.
00072         string tempFile = TEST_FILE_NAME;
00073         tempFile.append("2.TMP");
00074         if(Copy(TEST_FILE_NAME, tempFile))
00075         {
00076                 DataSetHeader dataSetHdr;
00077                 ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00078                 nvt.SetName(L"First");
00079                 nvt.SetValueInt32(11);
00080                 dataSetHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00081                 nvt.SetName(L"Deuxieme");
00082                 nvt.SetValueFloat(5.75f);
00083                 dataSetHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00084                 dataSetHdr.SetName(L"Test2");
00085                 dataSetHdr.SetRowCnt(0);
00086                 GenericFileUpdater* updater = new GenericFileUpdater(tempFile);
00087                 DataSetWriter* writer = updater->GetUpdateDataSetWriter(dataSetHdr);
00088                 writer->WriteHeader();
00089 
00090                 writer->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00091                 delete writer;
00092                 delete updater;
00093 
00094                 GenericData gData;
00095                 GenericFileReader reader;
00096                 reader.SetFilename(tempFile);
00097                 reader.ReadHeader(gData);
00098                 gData.Close();
00099                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSetCnt() == 6);
00100                 std::wstring name = gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetName();
00101                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(name.compare(L"Test2") == 0);
00102                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetRowCnt() == 0);
00103                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00104                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00105                 
00106                 ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt begin, end;
00107                 gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00108                 ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt ii = begin;
00109                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetName() == L"First");
00110                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetValueInt32() == 11);
00111                 ++ii;
00112                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetName() == L"Deuxieme");
00113                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetValueFloat() == 5.75f);
00114         }
00115         // dont' delete the file because it is used in the next test.
00116 }
00117 
00118 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::UpdateExistingDataSet1Test()
00119 {
00120         // Update an existing data set at the end of the file
00121         string tempFile = TEST_FILE_NAME;
00122         tempFile.append("2.TMP");
00123 
00124         DataSetHeader dataSetHdr;
00125         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00126         nvt.SetName(L"Happy Day");
00127         nvt.SetValueAscii("fun in the sun");
00128         dataSetHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00129         dataSetHdr.SetName(L"Test2");
00130         dataSetHdr.SetRowCnt(0);
00131         GenericFileUpdater* updater = new GenericFileUpdater(tempFile);
00132         DataSetWriter* writer = updater->GetUpdateDataSetWriter(dataSetHdr);
00133         writer->WriteHeader();
00134 
00135         writer->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00136         delete writer;
00137         delete updater;
00138 
00139         GenericData gData;
00140         GenericFileReader reader;
00141         reader.SetFilename(tempFile);
00142         reader.ReadHeader(gData);
00143         gData.Close();
00144         int32_t dataSetCnt = gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSetCnt();
00145         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataSetCnt == 6);
00146         std::wstring name = gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetName();
00147         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(name.compare(L"Test2") == 0);
00148         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetRowCnt() == 0);
00149         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetNameValParamCnt() == 1);
00151         
00152         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt begin, end;
00153         gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00154         ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt ii = begin;
00155         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetName() == L"Happy Day");
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetValueAscii() == "fun in the sun");
00157 
00158         // uncomment this line when the updater is working
00159         remove(tempFile.c_str());
00160 }
00161 
00162 void GenericFileUpdaterTest::UpdateExistingDataSet2Test()
00163 {
00164         // Update an existing data set that is not at the end of the file
00165         string tempFile = TEST_FILE_NAME;
00166         tempFile.append("4.TMP");
00167         if(Copy(TEST_FILE_NAME, tempFile))
00168         {
00169                 DataSetHeader dataSetHdr;
00170                 ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00171                 nvt.SetName(L"First");
00172                 nvt.SetValueInt32(11);
00173                 dataSetHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00174                 nvt.SetName(L"Deuxieme");
00175                 nvt.SetValueFloat(5.75f);
00176                 dataSetHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt);
00177                 dataSetHdr.SetName(L"Intensity");
00178                 dataSetHdr.SetRowCnt(0);
00179                 GenericFileUpdater* updater = new GenericFileUpdater(tempFile);
00180                 DataSetWriter* writer = updater->GetUpdateDataSetWriter(dataSetHdr);
00181                 writer->WriteHeader();
00182 
00183                 writer->UpdateNextDataSetOffset();
00184                 delete writer;
00185                 delete updater;
00186 
00187                 GenericData gData;
00188                 GenericFileReader reader;
00189                 reader.SetFilename(tempFile);
00190                 reader.ReadHeader(gData);
00191                 gData.Close();
00192                 int32_t dataSetCnt = gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSetCnt();
00193                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dataSetCnt == 6);
00194                 std::wstring name = gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetName();
00195                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(name.compare(L"Intensity") == 0);
00196                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetRowCnt() == 0);
00197                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetColumnCnt() == 0);
00198                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetNameValParamCnt() == 2);
00199                 
00200                 ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt begin, end;
00201                 gData.Header().GetDataGroup(0).GetDataSet(5).GetNameValIterators(begin, end);
00202                 ParameterNameValueTypeConstIt ii = begin;
00203                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetName() == L"First");
00204                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetValueInt32() == 11);
00205                 ++ii;
00206                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetName() == L"Deuxieme");
00207                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(ii->GetValueFloat() == 5.75f);
00208         }
00209         // uncomment this line when the updater is working
00210         remove(tempFile.c_str());
00211 }
00212 
00213 bool GenericFileUpdaterTest::Copy(std::string filename, std::string copyFilename)
00214 {
00215         ifstream in(filename.c_str(), ios::in | ios::binary);
00216         ofstream out(copyFilename.c_str(), ios::out | ios::binary);
00217         if(in.is_open() && out.is_open())
00218         {
00219                 char* buf = new char[1];
00220                 while(!in.eof())
00221                 {
00222                         in.read(buf, 1);
00223                         out.write(buf, 1);
00224                 }
00225                 delete buf;
00226                 in.close();
00227                 out.close();
00228                 return true;
00229         }
00230         return false;
00231 }
